title: X-Metaverse
author: X-Metaverse
created_time: December 01, 2022, 06:42:32 AMLast edit: December 20, 2022, 09:00:47 AM by X-Metaverse
content: Dear Commanders, We are pleased to announce that the X-Metaverse DAO platform is launch now! Today’s first release marks another milestone for us, as each member of the DAO will become an ecological Builder, not a trader, and all will work towards the same goal of building the best P2E games together.About X-Metaverse DAO, you can check more relevant details in our Gitbook.Now, let’s get into the X-Metaverse DAO with a short tutorial.][url][url]][url]][url][url][/url][/url]How to get veXMETA1. Click on https to go to the DAO page, or go to the DAO page from “DAO” at the top of the official website.2. Connect the wallet.3. Use XMETA exchange to get veXMETA.veXMETA Stake (get veXMETA bonus)Lock positions in veXMETA mining to get veXMETA, the longer the lock position to get more veXMETA, lock positions during the non-withdrawable, first come first served. veXMETA governance token will be sent to users by monthly linear.veXMETA Stake APY as follows.How to put veXMETA into veXMETA Stake1. Click on https to enter the DAO page and click on “veXMETA Stake” at the top.2. Click on the number field in the bottom right corner, enter the veXMETA you want to stake, then select the length of time, and click “Stake” at the bottom to complete the veXMETA Stake.3. veXMETA Stake rewards can be claimed at any time, and you can complete your claim by clicking on “Claim” in the bottom left corner. Note: Once your Stake period has ended, you will need to make a new Stake, otherwise it will not generate any revenue.veXMETA DIVIDEND (get XMETA bonus)Members who staking in the dividend pool will receive a 60% share of the X-Metaverse eco-revenue, and as long as you are in the staking pool, you will receive a portion of the platform’s revenue. veXMETA DIVIDEND tokens in the pool need to be locked for 1 month. DIVIDEND rewards are sourced from 60% of the DAO vault, The dividend payment date is the 21st of each month.How to put veXMETA into veXMETA DIVIDEND1. Click on https to enter the DAO page and click on “veXMETA DIVIDEND” at the top.2. Click on the number field at the bottom right corner, enter the veXMETA you want to stake, and click “Lock” at the bottom to finish. veXMETA will not be able to do any action after it is locked.3. veXMETA DIVIDEND rewards are available on the 21st of each month and can be claimed by clicking on “Claim” in the bottom left corner. Note: Once your Stake period has ended, you will need to make a new Stake, otherwise it will not generate any revenue.DAO Invitation RewardsThe 8% reward from the destruction rate will be automatically converted into veXMETA reward for users who actively invite their friends to join DAO, and the reward will be issued once a month. At the same time, this 8% reward will be officially repurchased and destroyed 100%. veXMETA’s invitation relationship will be synchronized with the existing invitation relationship in real time.The 8% bonus is allocated as follows (updated monthly)● 15% is used for basic rewards: become a DAO user to get rewards, hold 1 veXMETA to become a DAO user, all rewards of this part will be divided equally by new users.● 60% is used to invite others to hold veXMETA; users who invite the ranking will be directly allocated all rewards according to the percentage of invitation.● 25% is used to reward users invited to participate in the pledge pool or participate in the pledge bonus pool; the higher the number of veXMETA formed by the invitee’s participation in the stake, the higher the invitee’s reward.About X-MetaverseX-Metaverse is a blockchain 3D game that runs on Android, IOS and PC. All game contents and characters are based on Blockchain tokens and NFTs. X-Metaverse’s visuals and gameplay are inspired by Starcraft and Star Wars. Players will be immersed in the vast expanse of space, spending time cultivating different races, Upgrading ships, reaching more galaxies and collecting rare materials. The most exciting part is that you can earn cryptocurrency with other players through actions such as conquest, exploration, competition, mining, production, breeding and combat.Follow us on social media and be the first to get the news!Website：https://www.x-metaverse.org/Twitter：https://twitter.com/XMetaverse_Discord：http://discord.gg/x-metaverseMedium：https://medium.com/@X-MetaverseYouTube：https://www.youtube.com/c/XMetaverseTelegram：https://t.me/XMetaverse_officialTelegram Channel：https://t.me/XMetaverse_Channel
